name: Adventure Namek: Tatzumakii Deluxe
description:
Adventure Namek is an adventure game developed by many creative minds.

Listen to the full project here: 

https://upstremity.bandcamp.com/track/adventure-namek-vol-1-teimless-cruise-mix

The story is based on the impact that frequcy waves have on the minds of all of us. 

Tatzumakii was the originator of the sound and concept behind the game. Teimless is the performing artist on the project. Heavily based on the shows Adventure Time and Dragonball Z
